item.title: Enabling quest tab (zenith)
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

You need to find the sprite for a quest tab in that revision, it might already be there, if not pack it to the cache using a high revision cache editor and then use the proper code to add it in. If you get as far as the Sprite, I can help you with the code.

Read full topic
